apt-summary-genotype.cpp File Reference

Program to generically transform cel file data using chipstreams and write the data to a new cel file. Also serves as relatively simple code sample to illustrate usage of chipstream code. More...

Detailed Description

Program to generically transform cel file data using chipstreams and write the data to a new cel file. Also serves as relatively simple code sample to illustrate usage of chipstream code.

Author:
Alan Williams

Fri Dec 7 09:10:30 PST 2007
